website_summaries.verdict: Uniquely designed, this woven polyethylene blanket filters out any dirt or sand that lands on top of it.
pros: Double-layer, 1-way sift design lets sand and dirt filter out
Fabric is a double-layer weave made from polyethylene
Attaches to the ground with D-rings
Available in a variety of colors and sizes
cons: Texture is a little rough for lying and sitting compared to traditional beach blankets

customer_reviews.title: Was too good to be true...
customer_reviews.text: I don't get it??? I don't see how this provides any benefit or works. Did I just pay $100 for a plastic mat? UPDATE: We used this for half of a day on a Saturday. Brought it back to our play and sprayed it down with water. We let it sit out hoping that the sand stuck between the layers would eventually sift out. It didn't, but the rings along the edges were rusted by Monday. Definitely not made for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with coarse sand
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this mat but was diaapppinted. We live in Hawaii so visit the beach often. The sand in Hawaii (Oahu) is very course. Not the soft, fine sand I have experienced other places. Because of this, the sand doesn’t go through the mat like the pictures/videos show. Instead, it stays on the mat until it is shaken off. I also don’t like how there is no way to hold the mat together once you fold it up. If there was a strap or carrying case, it would make it much easier to carry and store.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Don't bank on this working as you plan
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. Bought to take on cruise to Bermuda so we wouldn't be messing with sandy things. Well I don't know what sand they use in their videos but Bermudan sand DEFINITELY does not go right through it, especially if even slightly moist. Doesn't sift through even when completely dry. So they must be using extremely fine sand. So we still dealt with sandy things at the beach and carried sand back with us.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gibson

customer_reviews.title: The size of the mat is good and the material keeps small particles like sand off ...
customer_reviews.text: The size of the mat is good and the material keeps small particles like sand off the top. I also like that it's reversible, giving you two color options. I've used the mat for only a few months and have to say the stitching quality is lacking. The edges of the mat are separating from the body and there are long threads hanging off that I have to cut. The D-rings that are on the separated edges have fallen off because of the poor stitching. The D-rings are also rusted from being in the rain. If the stitching was improved and the metal on the rings was rust-proof, this would be the perfect mat.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Cromie

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: we are at the beach now. Love the blanket.. my daughter said it was a little uncomfortable but her normal towel helped with that. con the worset part os folding it up, so sand collects between the top and bottom and you have to shake it out. After a mouth full of sand the first time... I take a little more care.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 3

customer_reviews.title: Works like expected. Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This mat really made life camping in sand easier. We planned a dream trip to Dry Tortugas, but was dreading 4 days of camping on sand with 2 young kids. This mat did great at keeping majority of sand from being brought into tent. Larger debris easily brushed away. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley & Andrew

customer_reviews.title: While I'm happy with my purchase this mat doesn't work anything like ...
customer_reviews.text: While I'm happy with my purchase this mat doesn't work anything like what's advertised. The saving grace is I didnt expect it to. Sand doesn't not at all filter through as efficiently as it appears to in the advertisement video. But it doesn't set on the top either. Overall I'd recommend this if your wanting a tarp to set your things on, because it is really durable and we will use it again. Just set your expectations realistically. Also other reviews mentioned if the sand is wet it doesn't filter through at all and this is 100% accurate. So set this up where the sand is dry and it will be more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easy. Just shake it off and put back in ...
customer_reviews.text: Sand doesn't filter through on St. Petersburg, Florida beaches. Too much shell content. Cleans easy. Just shake it off and put back in beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for fine sand.  Otherwise, doesn't work as well.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but our beach definitely didn't have the "fine" sand where it falls straight through. Definitely didn't work for wet sand either. The sand needed to dry and you needed to shake it out before it fell through
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Mat itself great but the bag it's stored & carried in needs attention
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sweet. 4 stars overall because I've used it twice and the wrap around the rope handles is already come away, as you see by the picture. 4 stars for value because for the total price of the product, I expected all of it to be durable, not just the mat itself.... So 3 stars for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrance O'Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This Matt is perfect. We live in the north east and visit local lakes regularly. It is sooooo nice to be able to have a sand free area. We have two little ones who get sand all over, but we just rub our hand on this and the sand goes right through. I also love that it have eye holes to anchor it down. We have some extra anchors from our tent so I use those and the matt stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this for keeping sand out
customer_reviews.text: Just used this on a 21 day Grand Canyon rafting trip where there was sand everywhere. The sand tarp made a little sand free haven around my cot/tent. Will be taking it everywhere. On suggestion, get a short strap or make a mesh bag to carry it in. Dunk it in the water before packing and all the sand will wash away before packing.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well if: 1) You keep it fairly stretched flat (I used the stake locations of a 10x10 Ozark Trl straight leg canopy which was pretty close to the 10x10 mat). 2) The mat stays dry (it retains water a bit more than I had hoped but dried in the sun with a couple shakes in an hour or so). 3) the sand is dry (don't know that I can really fault the mat for how wet sand cakes up but it's worth noting that it won't filter through until fairly dry). Cleaning and storing is pretty much just a shake and fold given things are dry.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad it comes in such a generous size. It was perfect for our last beach picnic. The sand really drains down past the surface of the blanket. Multiple adults and kids put it to the test. Obviously bigger pebbles and things don't, but I was really happy with the performance. I thought it wouldn't be comfortable to sit on, but it wasn't too bad. (We will see once it's really hot out, but for a cool evening it was fine). I recommend this for anyone who goes to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: 9danke

customer_reviews.title: Great Camp Mat
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this camp mat and it works really well and is priced just right. The first thing I do when I get to camp is spread this out behind my truck and keeps that area clean. I sleep in the back of my truck and cook on the tailgate so having a nice clean area there is very important so I don't track dirt and debris into the truck. Small dirt will just fall right through the mat while larger debris such as pine needles and leaves rest on top. At the end of the trip I just shake this out, fold it up and slide it back into the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It’s love it! It is easy to clean, fold, and secure to the ground. I’ve seen other patterned style one and my parents and sister have them but they are thick and you trip on them and they get snags. You WILL NOT have those problems with this one! You stake it in with the rings and it lays nice and flat. If does not snag or get pulls. It is the best. I will say it better be this awesome for the price 🙄. It’s an investment but worth it. You’ll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Its nice, does allow for a (somewhat) sand free surface
customer_reviews.text: Its nice, does allow for a (somewhat) sand free surface. Its kind of a pain to fold up because I bought such a large mat, and it does retain a lot of sand inside so if you don't shake it out be prepared to take the beach home with you. But! It does do a pretty good job at what its supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Saleena B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat based on the great reviews. We used it once and when we came back to camp, it had holes all over it. I couldn’t figure out what was causing them until I saw a chipmunk chewing through it. Sorry, but chipmunks and camping go together. I’m very disappointed in the quality and durability of this mat. Unfortunately it only lasted one camping trip. Definitely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice on camping day one.  Not So nice by camping day 20.
customer_reviews.text: Within the first camping season, holes wore into mat. Metal rings all show rust. Was never used on camping trips with campfires or anything that would risk damaging the mat or deviate from its marketed use-case. The mat itself works great- allows dry sand to pass through and offers a reasonable surface. Looks fantastic when new. Not particularly durable, especially considering the price and weight.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crew

customer_reviews.title: Best camping mat ever
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use outside our camper door instead of an outdoor rug, and it has been perfect! It's a little bigger than we need, so we keep it folded in half, but the extra size is nice for the times we've also used it as a picnic blanket. I was hesitant to spend so much with cheaper camping mats out there, but this has been totally worth it. It always feels clean under bare feet. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Sand may sift through a bit, but good luck getting the sand off this material. It won't shake off. The sand sticks to it. I can shake out a beach towel, but I cannot get the sand off of this multimat. I would not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Middlebrook

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor camping mat - easy to clean and take care of!!
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor mat - so glad we purchased it - once you use it and then have to pick up for packing after camping (anywhere, not just the beach), all the sand leaves it and it fold up nicely - once at home, you can take a water hose to it and it drys quickly, then just fold it up and repack it in your camper!!! The plastic stakes can be purchased separately that hold it down. Great buy,
customer_reviews.author: pmb

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for the beach. I will note that SOME sand will come through so its best to pair a towel on top of it if bringing to the beach. If the sands not completely flat and you lay the mat down and step on it trying to level it out sand will leak through. If wet sand gets on it, it also wont go through the mat but that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy creel

customer_reviews.title: ... this to the beach and while it did a great job of keeping the sand off our stuff
customer_reviews.text: I took this to the beach and while it did a great job of keeping the sand off our stuff, we were only able to use it for about 10 minutes because even after that short time outside, it was so hot it burned my toddler's feet. I'll try it again for camping where there's likely more shade.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying outdoor comfort
customer_reviews.text: We bought the mat for outside our Rpod on camping trips. It has worked out great. It is easy to hose off and dries quickly. It is also easy to sweep clean of rocks and loose dirt. When we are not camping we use it on the deck to our house and it keeps the surface cooler to walk on and no slivers from the old deck boards. Stands up well to chairs, and tables placed on top of the mat and helps in leveling the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Karathoner

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mat. We took it to the beach and it was amazing. The 8x8 size fit three of us laying comfortably across it. The sand easily sifted through. When walking on the mat, sand did not come back up. Wet sand does not easily go through the mat, but that is to be expected. When the wind blew the mat did not fly away. I have already recommended this mat to several friends. I also love the blue/lime colors (I like bright colors) Feel free to contact me if you have other questions.
customer_reviews.author: Ally F.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. If sand gets wet it can stick between ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. If sand gets wet it can stick between the layers but as soon as it dries, it all comes as intended.
customer_reviews.author: BQNB

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool sandless concept
customer_reviews.text: This is a beach lifesaver. Such a cool sandless concept! Definitely made our trip to the beach less messy. The 10x10 size is heavy, you will need a carrying bag. It comes with a very flimsy clear snap bag but it's very poorly made and broke the first time we took it out of the bag. But the mat is great! Well worth the money. Definitely take plunge and invest!
customer_reviews.author: TSB

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach/Camping Mat!
customer_reviews.text: This Mat works just as expected! We took ours to the beach and it was awesome! The beach we went to did have shells, so the sand went through, but the smaller shells remained. Also, wet sand will eventually go through when it dries, but keeping a small broom would be a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I took this as a hostess gift on a trip to Ireland. I was concerned that the weight and some reviews would doom it - but it worked like a charm! We watched other beach-goers flick and flap their towels, rubberized blankets too no avail. But this sand-free mat did everything I'd hoped for. Sure, wet sand should be allowed to dry before expecting it to move through the layers. Small shells, stones and other debris just need a flick. My only regret - the size. Three adults just fit, lying side-by-side. I'll buy the next size up when I buy it as a gift for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rug for #vanlife
customer_reviews.text: I'm a #vanlife guy - this is a perfect rug to put out in front of your van / under the awning. The dirt self-cleaning function is great but the ability to stake the corners is super important
customer_reviews.author: hgpilot - MM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. a definite must have when going to the beach. It keeps your area clean and sand free but don't lay directly on it, it is kinda abrasive and will dig into your skin so put a towel down. Great for picnics to I noticed not many ants will go near you food if it is on this
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Rand

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for flooring under easy up
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for laying under our 12x12 easy up over grass and sand for swim meets and other all day youth sport events. Durable too. Probably the only downside is it’s not light or compact which I can live with. Best ground cover I’ve found.
customer_reviews.author: MCook

customer_reviews.title: All I hoped for in fine beach sand
customer_reviews.text: Used this under a canopy caming in fine beach sand (Texas Gulf Coast). So much better than tarps. Fine sand went right through. If wet sant sits on top, just rub it with your foot and it disappears. Only down side is that is is hard to clean when you get home unless you have a sloping driveway and access to water (I don't). Plan to get more for tent vestibule and other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley B.

customer_reviews.title: Not Sand Free
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product - beach sand did not pass through it like advertised. Plus at the end of the day it was impossible to get all the sand off of it and out of it and it became very heavy to carry back up to the condo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping and beach
customer_reviews.text: The smallest size is bigger than i expected. If your camping its perfect rug for in front of your rv or tent the big gravel pieces sweep right off. Ay the beach we didn't even try to stake it down and it didn't budge once. If the sand is wet it obviously won't go thru but it dries super quick . It is a bit rough to lay on at the beach but it makes a great place for the dog to lay on and us to put our bags and cooler on
customer_reviews.author: Savann

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: sucks sand will not drain off the mat dont waiste your money
customer_reviews.author: tim budash

customer_reviews.title: QUESTIONABLE ORiGIN possible counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: There are just a couple anomaly's with our CGEAR mat one was the Cap't Morgan Embroidered bag the other was the binding has disintegrated and all the rings have fallen off. I question whether this is an original CGEAR mat or a knock off. I am betting counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: Cea Heartwood

customer_reviews.title: Will not go to the beach without it
customer_reviews.text: The best on the beach! Lightweight, it did not wrinkle or blow away, and even wet sand eventually dropped right through.
customer_reviews.author: SmartBuyer

customer_reviews.title: says its a large but is is not, its a medium.
customer_reviews.text: labeled as a large camping mat, mat is 10' x 10', according to cgears mat, the large camping matt is 8' x 20' which i though i was getting, the mat was also used, had trash and debris on it, some small tears, sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Jon W

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Terrible to clean, sand has to be forcefully pushed through. Not comfortable, verging in painful to lay on.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I've seen other reviews complain about sand getting trapped in the weave. Didn't have any similar issue. Nice and durable. Does not necessarily fold up with a crease like you might expect as with a tarp or sheet. Would store nicely in a reusable 'grocery' carry bag or similar item when transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Promising
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product to have, but uncomfortable to lay inside of it. I would recommend to bring another towel or blanket to lay over the actual tarp
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Amazing carpet
customer_reviews.text: We are traveling for two years. We have used this outside our motorhome for 6 months now. We simply shake it off and move on. It is durable and easy to clean. Don’t like the color but oh well! Otherwise it is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Denese Hall

customer_reviews.title: Thought about buying this item for a year, now ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought about buying this item for a year, now that I got one I wish I bought it last year. Large and functional it really does keep the sand at bay. It also doesn't retain heat so no need to worry about it getting hot on a sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Not as comfortable as a beach towel.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea Works well but not as comfortable as a beach towel. I also found that it took a bit more effort to shake the sand out when packing it up and brought a little extra sand home.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Carrithers

customer_reviews.title: Like the fact that sand and fine dirt fall through ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one of these I've bought (also have the 8' x 8') We use these when RVing with our travel trailer and are using them in instead of the standard roll up rug used by others. Like the fact that sand and fine dirt fall through the weave and thus prevent tracking a lot of it into the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Fufund

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach Blanket!!
customer_reviews.text: No need to worry about taking all the sand from the beach home with you with this blanket! Super easy to shake out all of the sand and most of it just slides right through, so no need to constantly shake out while you're at the beach. Definitely worth the price for this convenience.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Great camp rug/floor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We bought it for our “camp rug” and works great and seems to be durable. It’s easy to clean and dries quickly. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We used it this year at the beach, it is amazing how it keeps the sand down. It it good to have. it didn't get to hot like I thought that it would. It isnt soft like a towel so you will still need to put towels over it to lay on.
customer_reviews.author: bigvpower

customer_reviews.title: Clear rocks or sharp objects below. Great for dirt or sand.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for dirt or sand, as described. Remove any rocks or sharp objects before staking to the ground. It didn’t tear, but noticed some sharp objects attempting to tear through.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect when we were vending to keep our vending booth from turning into a muddy mess during rain and it dried out so quickly. Definitely worth the cost, I haven't found anything else that works as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn & Jenny Holland

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at the beach
customer_reviews.text: This mat worked out great for the beach! It provided a mostly sand-free area. The sand didn't quite go through when there was a large amount but with a few brisk sweeps the sand was gone! And at the end of the beach day, a shake out in the breeze was all it needed. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: flygirl

customer_reviews.title: Works great for camping.
customer_reviews.text: If you have an RV and you like to lay out a mat in front of your door, look at one of these. The dirt falls right through and what doesn't fall through is easily swept off. Kept my folks trailer way cleaner on our 2 week trip than it would have been with AstroTurf and boot brushes.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Worth every penny. Makes our camp site look and feel comfy and clean. Awesome when it gets muddy and easy to clean. Survived a 2020 camp season so overall that is saying something.
customer_reviews.author: jerms

customer_reviews.title: Beach camping mat
customer_reviews.text: These are the first thing to set up for camping. These mats keep the sand out. The sand falls right through unless it’s raining.
customer_reviews.author: The Buster

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition to the kit.
customer_reviews.text: Great material. Durable and comfortable. Good for the beach or under a tent.
customer_reviews.author: ph-delicious

customer_reviews.title: Nice camping pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to go under my tent but it was so nice I use just as a rug for my kids to play on when camping.
customer_reviews.author: Martinez

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: awesome. you'll want a blanket to lay on top as this is made out plasticy material and a bit hard to lay on directly. keep the sand out though, just as advertised!! we put it as an entry matt of sorts to our sun shade shelter when at the beach. we have a 2 year old and a 4 year old and this mat takes all the sand they can dish out! worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: doesn't really have sand go through it in the way they make it seem
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rose

customer_reviews.title: Protects, looks great, don’t wait!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for protecting tent floor, or for use at the beach. Seems a great place for kids, too.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Stacey

customer_reviews.title: bought as a gift for a friend and she likes ...
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for a friend and she likes it. Only thing is, you cant really use it without a towel over it otherwise the net hurts your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Gaw

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Used this in conjunction with a sleeping pad on a 6 day western river trip in SE Utah. Was great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a durable and easy to clean outdoor rug to use while camping throughout the Midwest. This mat is awesome! Not only are the colors fun, it comes with a convenient storage bag, and is SO easy to clean. After we get home from a camping weekend, we simply hang it up, hose it off, and let it air dry before tossing it back in it's bag for the next time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Richgels

customer_reviews.title: Quality for price is subpar
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 4 days on vacation and the carrying bag shredded. Blanket was okay quality but it doesn’t work as advertised unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: tiffo722

customer_reviews.title: Can you send me a bag not ripped to store in?
customer_reviews.text: When I received the mat the bag its stored in was taped in ripped areas. I thought it would of been in a durable bag so I can store it in my RV. The mat itself looks awesome.....
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Findley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricy but does a great job keeping the sand away. Can fit 3-4 towels which is great. a bit big to bring around but is nice if you are going to sit on the beach with multiple people for a while!
customer_reviews.author: liam

customer_reviews.title: Does what it say
customer_reviews.text: We took this to the beach in South Padre. It did what it said it does. Great to have a place to put on shoes without getting sand in them. It is heavy but that has an advantage. We would slide our boogie boards underneath the mat to keep them from blowing away even in the high winds. I went with four stars because I don't think we got as much use out of it as I imagined. Our kids preferred to play and lay in the sand anyhow. I will probably buy a small one for use outside of our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this product a tried & true test over the weekend camping on a sandbar. It was an ABSOLUTE lifesaver!! We used it as a mat outside our tent & on various sandbars as a picnic mat it served such a great purpose time & time again. I would highly recommend for anyone camping on sand or any sand adventure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Orange color completely faded after 1 season
customer_reviews.text: I took the blanket out of storage and when I unfolded it, the orange had all faded into a dull gray. It looks terrible. What is the warranty? Can I get a replacement or return this?
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to the beach and it works beautifully. We even poured sand on the top and it sifted right through as stated but sand would not come up through the mat. Magical!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We do a lot of surf camping and have dogs! These are like magic. No sand in tent or motor home! Now we give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and as expected
customer_reviews.text: Careful around a fire or grill as the burning ash will burn holes easily (we picnic in the desert). The holes don’t run though.
customer_reviews.author: Kdn

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the sand. But it can be used anywhere. It works well keeping sand out. Nice and big too.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Giacopelli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Pensacola Beach vacation and it worked perfectly! Bought a medium for 2 people with large beach towels we still had plenty of room for beach bag and drinks. Wet sand didn't really sift through but that didn't bother us. This is a new necessity for our annual beach trips!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Surface is rough and it didn't really sift the sand through
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not as good as what thye claim, only for very fine sand
customer_reviews.text: not as good as what thye claim, only for very fine sand
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Bombay

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome if you hate the sand getting all over you ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome if you hate the sand getting all over you towels this is for you. It is also much cooler than the beach sand so you have a place to stand when the beach is scorching hot.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Gentner

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but doesn't really keep sand off
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but doesn't really keep sand off. :/ I still like it though bc it's better than a towel or blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby M

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Material is high quality, looks great and easy to keep clean. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Oxendine

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and packable
customer_reviews.text: I use this for under the awning of my van and its perfect. I have also used it for a beach picnic blanket and LOVE IT. Recommend getting a few ground steaks to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wyman

customer_reviews.title: sand does not filter through as expected
customer_reviews.text: We like the product, but the sand does not filter through like we had hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Sand-Free mat we have purchased: we love them; Very well made: keeps sand outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Resistant and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I get , and I definitely love them , very sturdy , keeps the dirt out and dries out quick!
customer_reviews.author: The Williams family

customer_reviews.title: Great pick
customer_reviews.text: We have this sand mat for years and love it! Can’t go without it. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great to use under my RV's awning.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, I can't wait to use it while camping in my Vanagon Westfalia. Looks good quality and it will be a welcome addition under the van's awning.
customer_reviews.author: fig person

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: We took this camping for the first time 2 months ago. It did great keeping sand and dirt off before we got in our tent. Soft on our feet. When it rained it. It was dry within minutes. Great addition to go with camping tent or RV.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: If you go to the beach more than once a year this is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! I bought it for the dog, since he kept bringing sand on our towels. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product my son has one for camping and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product my son has one for camping and it really does work dirt and sand just pass through it and it gives you a clean surface. Great for camping and the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Guy R.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic mat.  Keeps the sand where it belongs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic mat. Keeps the sand where it belongs. Yeah, if its wet sand it wont fall through. Just give it time to dry and it will go through.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Evans

customer_reviews.title: but it was still better than putting our towels directly on the beach
customer_reviews.text: Wet sand will clump and will not sift through, but it was still better than putting our towels directly on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: S. Price

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: This is our go to mat for camping. Keeps the sand and dirt out. It is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Not Sand Free
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. It does not stay sand free. Some of the sand will go down between the holes, however the only difference between this and a beach blanket, is the beach blanket is easier to fold. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  I won't go to the beach without it anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I won't go to the beach without it anymore. It's so nice to be able to keep everything off the sand. I bought a second one! Very heavy duty!
customer_reviews.author: Scott A

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing! We took this down to the beach, used it all afternoon underneath our 10' X 10' easy up, and at the end of the day all we had to do was lift it up and shake it out! It was that simple! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hoyer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved this thing
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved this thing. Asked me where I got it because they wanted one. I got 10x10 so I could lay my towel in the middle and still keep the sand at bay. I like the beach, but my skin gets irritated very quickly by sand. This helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: but it gave a nice transition surface between sand and towels that kept our ...
customer_reviews.text: Works just as the other reviews stated. Wet sand is harder to sift through, but it gave a nice transition surface between sand and towels that kept our items much more sand-free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SAND FREE ZONE!!
customer_reviews.text: We go to the beach and camp every year....every year we ended up with as much sand inside the tent as there was outside! Until I found this mat!! Placed outside the door very little sand makes it inside!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela E Klingbeil

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME!!!!! Used it twice already in a month. I've never in my life been to the beach so much in one year lol. I did think though, that as soon as the sand gets on, it'll go straight through but it doesn't. You have to actually rub the sand in order for it to fall through. Otherwise I would have given it a 5. Wet sand is a little different. It'll clog the holes but after 20-30 min, it'll dry off and then fall off once you rub it through. BUT, it's 97% Bette than using a towel or anything that you can't brush off. I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JM

product_meta.title: CGEAR The Original Sand-Free Outdoor Camping Mat – Patented Technology, Water-Resistant and Anti-Fade Material, Military-Grade Construction – Multi Use Outdoor Blanket
product_meta.description: The Original Mat is the only outdoor mat on the market that features patented sand-free technology, and we only make it one way: to standards that reflect our military roots. CGEAR’s patented technology is a system of precisely engineered layers of high-density weave that allows particles of sand, dirt, and dust to fall through the fabric without being able to come back up. This was originally developed for military helicopters in desert warzones. Later, it was used for military drones before expanding to the civilian market. The Original Mat is UV stabilized to prevent fading, is fast drying, and resistant to water and mold. It features reinforced seams as well as double-reinforced, heavy-duty corner D rings, which allow it to be affixed to the ground quickly, easily, and securely, even in adverse conditions. The Original Mat is perfect for true outdoors people who demand durability and versatility in everything they own. It works great as a ground mat when camping, backpacking, and RVing. It’s also useful as a picnic, camp, and beach blanket. Whether it’s protecting your cameras during an outdoor shoot, or providing a sand-free pad for you and your friends to enjoy at a concert, the Original Mat will serve all your needs for years to come. For your convenience, it comes in 2 color options and 4 sizes. SMALL (6’ x 6’) is designed for 3 persons and small tent applications. It is also great for taking to the beach. MEDIUM (8’ x 8’) can accommodate 6 persons and larger tents. It’s great for families and/or those who travel with friends. LARGE (10’ x 10’) is designed for 10 persons and offers significant ground coverage, providing an impressive sandless space for bigger camps. XLARGE (12’ x 12’) is the biggest mat we make. It offers room for up to 14 people, meaning it can be used for outdoor banquets and other events.
feature_bullets: The Original – This mat started the sand-free revolution, and it remains in high demand as the ultimate sand-free ground pad, beach blanket, and equipment mat for serious outdoor adventures.
Patented System – Originally designed for military use (just see the video), our weave of high-density weave allows sand, dirt, and dust to fall through the fabric without coming back up.
Military-Grade Construction – In addition to our patented technology, The Original Mat is quality made to ensure ultra-durability, quick drying time, and resistance to water, and UV damage.
Heavy Duty D Rings – Take this product everywhere you go, and make sure it stays there with double-reinforced heavy-duty corner D Rings, perfect for staking down in extreme conditions.
Numerous Size Options – The Original Mat comes in 2 colors and 4 size options: SMALL (for 3 persons), MEDIUM (for 6 persons), LARGE (for 10 persons) and XLARGE (for 14 persons).
